snippet: It is the last airline in the United States to be without a union, and the first one for Virgin America.
abstract: Virgin American flight attendants approve representation by Transport Workers Union of America; airline is last carrier in United States without a union.
lead_paragraph: It is the last airline in the United States to be without a union, and the first one for Virgin America.

headline.main: Virgin America Attendants Get Airline’s First Union
headline.print_headline: Virgin America Attendants Get Airline’s First Union
